title: WHO IS READY TO BAKE SOME BREAD

replies.body: I'm bready
You knead not say more!

No... it's...
wink wink nudge nudge... Knead not say more!
Investing here.

http://img.pandawhale.com/61880-George-Michael-its-happening-i-dNrF.gif

https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-lnKeTNGHJFQ/V7tDJbHVgEI/AAAAAAAA9wM/iIMdkaaQ2oQpNVOnQTXc9J71Rkdo9J0QwCLcB/s1600/bbbb.jpg

 http://i2.wp.com/www.maximumpop.co.uk/wp-content/uploads/2015/03/okay-its-happening.gif

Everyone get ready to throw your money at the screen!
So Pantheon can be a baker but Graves can't have a cigar?
Please, Pantheon's dreams of baking go back long before Graves ever lost his cigar

Hell, if I recall, his dreams go back before Graves was even introduced to the game.

Am I right in this guess?
Right you are my friend, his dreams of baking are indeed go back further than Graves himself

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tKfCeFOqwVA

they predicted this coming since 2015.
Or you know, when people started asking for it immediately after hearing the VO...
{{champion:25}} "swoons"
*butter intensifies*

you appear to have burned your bread kind sir

you got the recipe wrong. 
pantheon's bread has 4 cups of salt, not 4 table  spoons.
Do you smell what the Panth is cookin'?

I hate Pantheon as a champion, but I could never hate this skin.

I am ready to be buttered/baked.
This may be the greatest skin to come, other than arguably dunkmaster darius.
